alert.message: This alert indicates increase in the duration for Cassandra Read Time.
alert.name: Trace Reader- increase in Cassandra read time

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in Cassandra reads failure rate.
alert.name: Trace Reader- increase in Cassandra read failure rate

alert.message: This alert indicates increase in the duration for ES reads.
alert.name: Trace Reader- increase in ES Read Time

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in elastic search failure rate.
alert.name: Trace Reader- Increase in ES read failure rate

targets.query: SELECT "reader.getFieldNames.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldNames.50thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldNames.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldNames.failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldValues.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldValues.50thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldValues.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getFieldValues.failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawTrace.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawTrace.50thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawTrace.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawTrace.failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawSpan.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawSpan.50thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawSpan.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT "reader.getRawSpan.failures.OneMinuteRate" FROM "haystack.traces.reader" WHERE "class" = 'trace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
